trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Independence
There were no other sightings in Independence on or around August 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsenormous dark triangle, flashing lights, banking over tree line, moving slow and silent, We were on our way home, 9:29pm Aug 3, 2013, in Independence Missouri, we were driving down 24 Hwy East, my mom noticed out of corner of her eye some flashing lights. She asked us what it was. When we looked at it we knew we weren't seeing anything we have ever seen before. The feeling was exciting and we were curious as to what this object was and we tried to chase it. Lost sight of UFO) due to distance and tree line. we need you to pull the video. sorry we do not know how.
